sentences.sContent: They criss-crossed the country by bus.
sentences.sCn: 他们乘坐公共汽车在乡间交叉往返。

trans.tranOther: If a person or thing criss-crosses an area, they travel from one side to the other and back again many times, following different routes. If a number of things criss-cross an area, they cross it, and cross over each other.
